text: 13:9: Jôk 20:14; Bal 5:18; Jôk 20:13; Bal 5:17; Jôk 20:15; Bal 5:19; Jôk 20:17; Bal 5:21; Och 19:18 Chongpêkngei, “Inrê no roh, mi that no roh, inru no roh, mita ôi no roh,” ti ngei le chongpêk dang ngei murdi hih, “Nangma nên lungkham angin nu bunga mingei lungkham roh,” ti hin a kaikhôm zit ani.
